bug.short_desc: Online Inspector Demo with Pre-Loaded App

long_desc.thetext:
When you open the Inspector online demo (s.URL), you get the demo index.html so you can chose an app to inspect. Wouldn't it be better for the non-initiated if a popular demo app like the Feedreader would be already loaded, and at least a few Inspector windows open, as opposed to just the rather small Inspector toolbar at the top of the page, easy to overlook, and it's not clear what to do next to get the Inspector going?!
It would be easy to achieve, by generating the 'inspector' job in the Feedreader app, and uploading that to the demo server.
Sounds like a good idea to me but generating the inspector only for the feedreader is restricting the inspector to that app and you cant test it with the showcase e.g. which is an inline app.
